div.p: Description:Direct participation in an exposure act where it is unknown that the participant is the source or subject of the exposure. If the participant is known to be the contact of an exposure then the EXPTRGT participation type should be used. If the participant is known to be the source then the EXSRC participation type should be used.

valueString.value: Lock all vaue sets untouched since 2014-03-26 to trackingId 2014T1_2014_03_26

description.value: Description: Direct participation in an exposure act where it is unknown that the participant is the source or subject of the exposure. If the participant is known to be the contact of an exposure then the EXPTRGT participation type should be used. If the participant is known to be the source then the EXSRC participation type should be used.
